page.title: 01A RURAL RIDE
page.content: We planned to ride around our grid in April but the weather was so wet and windy that it was not until mid-May that we could make our first journey. 24 children and 5 parents set off on their bicycles. Soon we left the Springbank Estate where most of us live and we were moving into the country past the GCHQ. This is a very secret place where the Government has equipment that listens in to radio messages from all over the world. Some say that if there is a war, Cheltenham will be the first town destroyed because the Russians would not want the place to continue. Later on our ride we passed an army place at Barrow where there is an underground shelter to protect important people. We all hope a war does not happen. We went on to Staverton and had to cross the A40. This is a very busy trunk road. Soon
